import React from 'react'; class Signin extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { signInEmail: '', signInPassword: '' } } onEmailChange = (event) => { this.setState({signInEmail: event.target.value}) } onPasswordChange = (event) => { this.setState({signInPassword: event.target.value}) } onSubbmitChange = () => { console.log(this.state); this.props.onPageChange('home') } render() { return (
Sign In
this.props.onPageChange('register')}>Register
) } } export default Signin;
